summary:
I am an enthusiastic and dedicated professional with keen interest in picking up and deploying new technology. I like operating on the interface between research and commercial application. I have acquired much experience in applying innovative depth imaging and velocity building technology on large datasets for oil and gas exploration.

Specialties: 
-Modelling
-Depth imaging and velocity model building
